attributes.action: Supporting Students Financially during the Covid Pandemic.
attributes.additional_details:
Students have paid full tuition fees for most courses which have been provided online therefore not getting value for money, plus they are having to pay for a full academic years of accommodation costs when most have spent minimal time at their student residence due to lockdowns and restrictions. 

So I would like the government to come up with a financial package to discount tuition fees and students to recover accommodation costs during the pandemic to ease their debt burden.
attributes.background:
I would like the government to discuss and implement a financial package for University students. 

The government has supported businesses through the pandemic with various grants and the furlough scheme, yet university students I feel have been forgotten about

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for the same actions:

Implement support for university students during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735

You may also like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: 

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285
